title: Enchanting Emerald & Diamond Bridal Collar Necklace - The "Aishwarya Haaram"
materials: showcasing a vivid green hue. The necklace is embellished with Freshwater Pearls for added elegance. Has a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: This exquisite collar necklace features an intricate floral and paisley motif entirely set with shimmering diamonds. A central emerald adds a regal touch. The design is complemented by cascading freshwater pearls, creating a mesmerizing drape. The pendant section is removable, offering versatility. The piece features a classic open setting to maximize the brilliance of the diamonds. The design takes inspiration from traditional South Indian temple jewelry while maintaining a contemporary elegance.
colors: accented by vibrant green emeralds and the soft luster of white pearls. This color palette evokes a sense of timeless elegance.
occasions: and grand festive occasions. Also suitable for milestone events like Seemantham
description: A testament to superior craftsmanship, this diamond and emerald collar necklace is a captivating blend of traditional and contemporary design. The high-quality diamonds and genuine emeralds ensure lasting value. The removable pendant offers versatility, making it suitable for various occasions. The necklace embodies cultural richness and reflects timeless elegance, making it a cherished heirloom piece.
